question: Kenneth has 3 tubes of white paint and 5 tubes of pink paint. Joe has one third as many tubes of white paint as Kenneth, and two times as many tubes of pink paint as Kenneth. How many tubes of paint does Joe have?
answer:
Joe has 3*1/3= <<3*1/3=1>>1 tubes of white paint
Joe has 5*2=<<5*2=10>>10 tubes of pink paint
Joe has a total of 1+10 =<<1+10=11>>11 tubes of paint
#### 11
